basics.name: Eunkyu Seong
basics.label: Phd Student
basics.summary: I am a Phd student in the Department of Economics at Seoul National University. My research interests are in the fields of applied econometrics.

publications.name: Are the Bank of Korea's Inflation Forecasts biased toward the target?

projects.name: Fiscal Multiplier in Korea - A Local Projection - IV Approach
projects.summary: We estimate the fiscal multiplier in Korea using a local projection IV approach.

projects.name: Evaluation of the Bank of Korea's Inflation Forecast
projects.summary: We evaluate the Bank of Korea's inflation forecast.
